CV

Professional Experience

since 04.2021 Professor for General Psychology (Allgemeine Psychologie), Faculty of Health, Health and Medical University Potsdam
11.2020 - 03.2021 Principal Investigator (DFG grant), Applied Cognitive Psychology Lab, Technical University of Darmstadt
04.2016 - 10.2020 Postdoctoral Researcher and Lecturer, Applied Cognitive Psychology Lab, Technical University of Darmstadt
10.2018 - 09.2019 Substitute Professor for Experimental Psychology (Allgemeine Psychologie), University of Hamburg
10.2017 - 03.2018 Substitute Professor for Experimental Psychology (Allgemeine Psychologie), University of Kassel
04.2014 - 03.2016 Postdoctoral Research Scholar, Learning and Transfer Lab (C. Shawn Green), University of Wisconsin-Madison
06.2011 - 03.2014 Postdoctoral Researcher and Lecturer, Applied Cognitive Psychology Lab (Wolfgang Ellermeier), TTechnical University of Darmstadt
11.2007 - 06.2011 Doctoral student, Applied Cognitive Psychology Lab (PhD supervisor: Wolfgang Ellermeier), Technical University of Darmstadt

Education

07.2011 PhD in Psychology (Dr. rer. nat.), Technical University of Darmstadt
09.2007 Diploma in Psychology (Dipl.-Psych.), University of Regensburg

Offered Faculty Positions

2020 Senior Lecturer in Cognitive Psychology, Northumbria University, Newcasle upon Tyne, UK (declined)
Professor for General Psychology, Health and Medical University Potsdam, Germany (accepted)

Funding and Awards

2021 Research Grant (PI), German Research Foundation (DFG), project number 399243066, Effects of evaluative conditioning on early sensory processing, extension for 3 months
2020 - 2023 Research Grant (PI), German Research Foundation (DFG), project number 421966099, Perceptual and cognitive control of auditory distraction, funding available for 36 months
2018 - 2021 Research Grant (PI), German Research Foundation (DFG), project number 399243066,, Effects of evaluative conditioning on early sensory processing, funding available for 30 months
2012 Travel Award for “Fechner Day 2012” in Ottawa, Canada, International Society for Psychophysics
2010 Award for “special achievements in academic teaching”, Vereinigung von Freunden der Technischen Universität zu Darmstadt e.V. (Ernst-Ludwigs Hochschulgesellschaft)

Reviewer Activity

Acta Psychologica; Behavioural Processes; Cognition and Emotion; Computers in Human Behavior; Deutsche Forschungsgemeinschaft (DFG); Frontiers in Psychiatry; Journal of Cognitive Psychology; Journal of Experimental Psychology: General; Journal of Experimental Psychology: Learning, Memory, and Cognition; Journal of Experimental Social Psychology; Journal of Mathematical Psychology; Journal of Personality; Learning and Behavior; Learning and Motivation; PLoS ONE; Psychological Research; Psychology of Music; Psychoneuroendocrinology; Social Cognition; Social Psychological and Personality Science; Quarterly Journal of Experimental Psychology
